attributes.action: Allow the Hunting Act to be broken with impunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Boxing Day 2006 four dogs are going to be set after the red deer that roam my farm.  This is an act of civil disobedience against your Government. Chasing deer away with dogs is the best way to prevent damage to my woodland.    Recognise the right to defy unjust law by failing in your civic duty to report this criminal activity.

rejection.details:
There are already a number of petitions on the Hunting Act online:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=Hunting+Act
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
